name: PowerGuru.org
overview:
PowerGuru is a new online platform dedicated to power electronics.

Power Guru features objective articles written by power electronics experts, articles about industry news, and company specific articles focused on products and application solutions.

The PowerGuru jobs page lists worldwide job offers specifically targeting power electronics engineers and is updated daily. The platform also provides the opportunity to communicate with other active participants in the field of power electronics.

A question and answer page allows visitors to propose and offer solutions to questions about power electronics challenges, and the website’s TechChat feature gives visitors the opportunity to consult with power electronics experts in real time.

Use of the site is currently free of charge to all visitors and the site welcomes contribution of articles from any qualified author who wishes to have their work displayed for public viewing.
